::DarkMouse::

She stood between Megatron and Scorponok. She held Scorponok's hand and gave 
it a gentle squeeze.  She let go of his hand and grabbed her small dagger.  
She held it down and out of sight.  She waited for Megatron to make contact 
with Panzertron.
